paragraphs.body: Should the film characters have infoboxes, does anyone think? -- Dudewaldo4 yada yada yada... • My stories • Stuff I did 15:36, June 11, 2010 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Has anyone realized that in the movie, Aang's name is pronounced "ong" (like in gong) and in the series it is pronounced "ayng" (like in bang)? - 24.206.97.79 23:20, July 8, 2010 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: Has anyone realized that in the movie, Aang's name is pronounced "ong" (like in gong) and in the series it is pronounced "ayng" (like in bang)? - 24.206.97.79 23:20, July 8, 2010 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: As much as I hate to say it; doesn't having in this article that "Aang developed a love interest for Katara" just come from speculation or "just knowing" it goes that way later? We really aren't shown anything to believe that in the movie. As such; that little snippet should be removed as speculative until something solid says so/the next movie(if it comes out) acknowledges that. Vulmen (talk • contribs) 03:31, March 27, 2011 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: As much as I hate to say it; doesn't having in this article that "Aang developed a love interest for Katara" just come from speculation or "just knowing" it goes that way later? As such; that little snippet should be removed as speculative until something solid says so/the next movie(if it comes out) acknowledges that. Vulmen (talk • contribs) 03:31, March 27, 2011 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Hm...ok; so, yeah, interpreted from the comments that there is a subtle build-up of a relationship that will happen. Perhaps having that reworded will make it carry much better, because as it is it says a bit too much I think. Perhaps something suggestive of their friendship having strengthened throughout their journey rather than simply stating Aang has a love interest for Katara plainly? Vulmen (talk • contribs) 05:55, March 27, 2011 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Okay. That's a very strong rewording, hasdi. Sorry for the downer on editing that...I'd rather see it there too. :S But, y'know... ^^" Vulmen (talk • contribs) 06:48, March 27, 2011 (UTC)
